MemberSignature.Value: public static Foundation.NSDictionary ToDictionary (this CoreGraphics.CGPoint self);
.method public static hidebysig class Foundation.NSDictionary ToDictionary(valuetype CoreGraphics.CGPoint self) cil managed

Docs.summary: Serializes a PointF into an NSDictionary.
Docs.returns: The serialized point as an NSDictionary.
Docs.remarks: You can deserialize the point back from the dictionary using the NSDictionary.ToPoint extension method.
